description: When you send data down to your device with our API or on the Dashboard, the response from the device will come back with this tag
Messages originating from a device get assigned a topic containing the device ID, e.g. `_DEVICE_1234_`.
Messages that come in via our socket API and used the JSON data format
Messages that come in via our REST API (as opposed to our socket API)
Messages that come in via our socket API (as opposed to HTTP REST API)
Messages that come in via our socket API and used the string data format
Messages that come in through our SMS-over-IP endpoint, or the Hologram SMS phone number
Messages sent to the CSR via Hologram's SMS phone number will contain this topics.
Messages that come in through our SMS-over-IP endpoint
